name: Intro
_source: speak;;Deep within the Nocturne Forest lies the ruins of a temple lost to time.|Dubbed the "Crypt of the Forgotten" by adventurers, many of the secrets deep within lay uncovered for centuries.|Although many have tried, nearly all who have attempted to explore the crypt have perished within its halls.;;;narration;2

speak;;Hired by the lord of House Bluegale, the mercenary Zeke and his band prepare to venture into the crypt.|The lord's daughter, Sky, seeks to recover an ancient tome from deep within its halls, hoping to analyze the history that lays within its pages.;;;narration;2

speak;;As our heroes approach the crypt, a deep fog sets over the forest.|The groans of the Entombed and the rattling of Bonewalkers can be hear from inside,{wait} beckoning them towards their most terrifying mission yet.;;;narration;2
speak;Zeke;Well, Sky. Is this the place?;;;;;;;;1
speak;Sky;Yes. The Crypt of the Forgotten. Home to magic and monsters lost to time.
speak;Zeke;Magic{tgm}...{tgm} can't say it's ever really been my forte.
speak;Roland;Can we just get down there already? These bugs are making me mad.;low_priority
speak;Sky;I{tgm}...{tgm} think you'll have a lot more than bugs to worry about down there.
speak;Roland;You think some puny monsters can beat me? Those things won't even know what hit 'em!;low_priority
speak;Isabella;I can help too, brother! I'll show those creepies a thing or two!
speak;Roland;Heh, that's what I'm talking about, sis. Just don't get too carried away down there.;low_priority
speak;Zeke;Heh. Looks like their spirits are as high as ever. How are you two feeling?
speak;Luna;Great. These little things eating away at my flesh are great. If I'm lucky, I might even get a disease.;low_priority
speak;Lex;Heheh{tgm}...{tgm} heh{tgm}...{tgm}  We're all good to go, boss. Just lead the way, and I'll shoot what needs to be shot.
speak;Sky;What an eccentric band we have.;;;;;;;;1
speak;Zeke;That's one way to put it. But we'll get the job done. Shall we?
# Move units and transition into inside crypt
speak;Blank;Gah, it's so dark down here. I can hardly see a thing.|Sky, do you know any fire spells?
speak;Blank_1;I'm not too good with them, but{tgm}...{tgm} Ignivosa!;;;;;;;;1
speak;Zeke;Helps enough for me to find my lantern. Thanks.|Anyway, you have any idea of where we're supposed to go down here?
speak;Sky;No. The crypt isn't documented well due to the lack of survivors.|We'll just have to wander around until we find it.
speak;Zeke;Figures. Well, there's no time like the present.|Everyone! The mission is to find that tome, and get out of here alive! Let's go!
